t: Merrithew International Inc. | ONCAP
s: ONCAP acquired Merrithew International Inc. ("Merrithew") in February 2022. Merrithew is a global leader in mindful movement as one of the largest developers, manufacturers and retailers of Pilates equipment, accessories, content and education worldwide.
